\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz-3dplot}
\begin{document}
\tdplotsetmaincoords{40}{100}
\foreach \rot in {0, 1, ..., 359} {
    \tdplotsetrotatedcoords{0}{0}{\rot}

    \node at (3,0,0) {x};
    \node at (0,3,0) {y};
    \node at ([xshift=5mm] 0,0,2) {z};
